title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 21
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 21
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Winnebago Industries (WGO). Winnebago Industries Inc.'s shares are headed for their biggest advance in nine months after fiscal third-quarter results were well received. The recreational-vehicle maker's sales topped analysts' average estimate in a Bloomberg survey by about 8 percent for the third straight quarter. Winnebago benefited from last year's $500 million takeover of Grand Design Recreational Vehicle, a specialist in RVs which are towed rather than driven.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
